rule: Each description must then provide details about the timing, referring to the time of day or specific moments, and the lighting, specifying the quality and direction of the light in the scene.
input: In the golden hour of late afternoon, sunlight filters through the autumn leaves, highlighting the vibrant colors and casting gentle rays.
coverage: A vibrant autumn forest featuring trees with rich red, orange, and yellow leaves, sunlight gently filtering through the branches during the golden hour of late afternoon. Warm, directional rays highlight the vivid colors, casting soft shadows on the leaf-covered ground. The background showcases a tranquil woodland setting bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The scene evokes a serene and nostalgic atmosphere, capturing the beauty and calm of a peaceful fall evening.
